channel.title: [Delta] Npc Shouting help [Delta] PLEASE HELP MEE!
channel.description:
Hey guys, im in a bit of a predicament...
See none of my npcs shout (yellow text above their heads)
and i wanna add text to one of them but i don't know how.
can some plz tell me how! thx!

item.title: [Delta] Npc Shouting help [Delta] PLEASE HELP MEE!
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:2, topic:398867”]if (npcs[i].npcType == ###) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "you're text!"; } } [/quote]
after what i add that?

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Npc Shouting help [Delta] PLEASE HELP MEE!
